snippet: Matz had skipped a start over the weekend because of elbow soreness, an ominous sign given that he has already had Tommy John surgery, in 2010.
abstract: No ligament damage is found in elbow of New York Mets pitcher Steven Matz; team has not announced when he will return to play.
lead_paragraph: Matz had skipped a start over the weekend because of elbow soreness, an ominous sign given that he has already had Tommy John surgery, in 2010.

headline.main: Mets’ Steven Matz Said to Have No Damage to Elbow Ligament
headline.print_headline: Matz’s Elbow Ligament Said to Show No Damage
